nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class Cross

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Partition
      nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.MultipleThreadsPartition
          nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Switch
              nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Cross

public class Cross
extends Switch

A bobbin going over the next bobbin. Having two bobbins in each hand usually the right bobbin in the left hand goes over the left bobbin in the right hand. In other words, the second bobbin goes over the third. A bobbin may be read as a group of bobbins treated as one.

Author:
J. Pol
